verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: declared] [ARGM-TMP: Thursday] [ARG1: that he did n't fire FBI Director James Comey over the Russia investigation] .
President Donald Trump declared Thursday that he [V: did] n't fire FBI Director James Comey over the Russia investigation .
President Donald Trump declared Thursday that [ARG0: he] did [ARGM-NEG: n't] [V: fire] [ARG1: FBI Director James Comey] [ARGM-ADV: over the Russia investigation] .
